In addition to our commitment to providing a high quality education, the health and safety of our students is our number one priority.

Thank you for your patience, flexibility and understanding.

Public Statement on High School Security Concerns

Over the past 10 days, four incidents concerning the safety and security of high school students and staff occurred in the Roselle Park School District. In each case, District Administrators and all personnel involved, acted appropriately and followed District protocols with respect to reporting and responding to the incidents. In each case, local authorities, including the Roselle Park Police Department and Union County Sheriff's Office, were immediately notified and acted swiftly and appropriately with respect to responding to the information received. The Roselle Park School District, including all personnel and the Board of Education, are committed to the safety and security of all students and staff.

Pedro A. Garrido
Superintendent of Schools

Please continue to check your email periodically for further notices from the Middle School.

Thank you.

Ms. Kathleen Carlin, Principal
